About.SectionDescription: Few words about me and my journey
About.Title: Technical Product Manager + Product Owner & Scrum Master Certified
About.Paragraph1: Passionate Technical Product Manager with over six years of hands-on experience leading successful features, products, and digital initiatives. I lead projects, sprints, ensuring high-quality delivery, exercising collaborative team and stakeholder management. I strive to always be up to speed on different topics including coding and design to be able to deliver and discuss with all stakeholders.
About.Paragraph2: I fled from a traditional path and explored my creativity, by trying my hands on various techniques and technologies. Product Management is more than just a profession for me, and I try to dig deep into it. Today, I like to use my skills in critical thinking, empathy, and creativity to create viable and impactful solutions.
